title: Solved Mysteries; or, Revelations of a City Detective
author: Macgovan, James.
snippet: Rushing up to the outside of the station, hesecured a cab, and was driven rapidly to the south side. Loder's den was in South Gray's Close, and, as the cab wentmuch faster than a man could walk, Bryne calculated on beingthere first. It would have been easy for him to confront thethief and claim his own, or he could have driven to theCentral and informed us, posing virtuously, and had Lodertaken with the treasure in his possession.
